songs.title: Wild’n  Cuz I’m Young (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Hook: Kid Cudi]
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old

[Verse 1: Kid Cudi]
Liquor all night, love it
Untamed youths, the Coupes moves like bullets
I guess the fact my father smoked and drank
Made it a young nigga destiny to do the exact same
Young wyling and all, me and my Codys
Watch the phonies, and hoes that claim they blew me
Dark skin China doll with the fake tits
Ice grillin' my Spanish chick, word
We all in together, now we off it
Cops be buggin', shotguns on the whip
Fuck 'em, I would never sweat for a piggy
You can catch me high, it's all good, no Biggie

[Hook: Kid Cudi]
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old

[Interlude: Kanye West]
Yeah
Yeezy
Ugh

[Verse 2: Kanye West]
Wylin' cuz I'm young, I be wylin' cause I'm young
She be wylin' cause I'm hung, they be violent where I'm from
Fee, fi, fo fum, bitches so dumb
On a balcony making out with me, like she so drunk
Got me feeling like a damn hunk
Headed home I'm bout to slam dunk
Pray to the box of mags, protect me when I'm old
Pop a few Vi-rags, resurrect me
Geezer, Ebenezer
Grab titties, prob'ly catch a fucking seizure
But keep a big ass crib with a theater
Remind me of my money when I catch amnesia, oww!

[Hook: Kid Cudi]
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old

[Verse 3: Kid Cudi]
Rage, 'cause I'm paid
Take the grey, and create another shade
Awesome, no mo' bitches playin possum
Pop and lock 'em and send 'em on home
Tired of hoes, all they want is to get chose
Know the code, when a women with some toes
Optimos, takin trips to Australia
Do some blow and hope you make it through the show
Hands, high, go with ya soul and try floatin through the sky
Hide the pain with some pussy and mimosas
Costa Rica, next on the agenda

[Hook: Kid Cudi]
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
Wild'n cuz I'm young, wil-wild'n cuz I'm young
I be wild'n cuz I'm young, I be wild'n cuz I'm young
And I'll be wild'n 'til I'm chill and old
